tags.name: Directory
tags.desc: Identify Portal of the user.

tags.name: Self
tags.desc: Returns url of the page this tag is on, but excludes http://{servername}/..

tags.name: Current URL
tags.desc: Returns url of the page this tag is on, but excludes http://{servername}/..

tags.name: Self Page
tags.desc: Returns url of the page this tag is on, but excludes http://{servername}/.. and URL parameters

tags.name: URL Post Values
tags.desc: Returns the URL parameters

tags.name: Referer
tags.desc: Returns the full url of the referring web page. If the page containing this tag is browsed directly, it will default to http://{servername}/admin/changesrecorded.white.html.

tags.name: Referer Short
tags.desc: Returns the url of the referring web page, but excludes http://{servername}/..

tags.name: Referer Page
tags.desc:
Returns the url of the referring web page
Defaults to changesrecorded.white.html when not set

tags.name: PSAID
tags.desc: Returns a portion of the PSAID for internal page calls

tags.name: Teacher Home Page
tags.desc: Returns the url of the Teacher's Home Page.

tags.name: Scripts URL
tags.desc: Returns the url of the server scripts.

tags.name: Last Promotion Date
tags.desc: Year ID of most recent school year. Incremented during EOY Process.

tags.name: Course Archive Year
tags.desc: Safer way to display the server YearID.

tags.name: Course Archive Time
tags.desc: Time of the last time the EOY Process was run.

tags.name: Current Server Year ID
tags.desc:
Displays server YearID.
Please use the safer DAT ~[pref:coursearchiveyear]

tags.name: Current Server Term ID
tags.desc:
Displays server TermID.
Could interfer with the selected year & term

tags.name: Schedule Year
tags.desc: Displays Schedule Year defined in PowerScheduler.

tags.name: Current Teacher ID
tags.desc: This is the ID of the current teacher.

tags.name: Current Teacher Number
tags.desc: This is the Number of the current teacher.

tags.name: Current Staff/Teacher Name
tags.desc: This is the Name of the current staff/teacher.

tags.name: Current Teacher Name
tags.desc: This is the Name of the current teacher.

tags.name: Current User ID
tags.desc: This is the ID of the current user.

tags.name: Current User ID
tags.desc: This is the ID of the current user.

tags.name: Current User ID
tags.desc: This is the ID of the current teacher.

tags.name: Teacher Photo
tags.desc: Display the photo for current teacher.

tags.name: Guardian ID
tags.desc: This is the ID of the current guardian user.

tags.name: Current User Type Name
tags.desc: This is the Type of the current user.

tags.name: Current User Name
tags.desc: Outputs the current user's Username in Last, First Middle format.

tags.name: Current User Name
tags.desc: Outputs the current user's first and last name.

tags.name: Current User Email
tags.desc: Outputs the current user's Email.

tags.name: Current User Login
tags.desc: Displays the current user's login username.

tags.name: Current User's DCID
tags.desc: Outputs the current user's DCID from the Users table.

tags.name: Students In Set
tags.desc: Outputs the number of currently selected students.

tags.name: Do This For Selected
tags.desc: Displays how many students are selected, or displays the name of a single selection.

tags.name: Do This For (Student/Group)
tags.desc:
Generate set of radio buttons to select the student or group of students.
Reference the Select list using the name DOTHISFOR. Value for the student = Students.ID & Group = "selected"

tags.name: Number Selected Records
tags.desc: Outputs the number of selected records.

tags.name: User's Roles
tags.desc: Outputs the users associated groups/roles numbers as a comma delimited string.

tags.name: User's Group Names
tags.desc: Outputs the users associated groups/roles Names as a comma delimited string.

tags.name: PowerScheduler Access
tags.desc: Outputs the True or False if the user has access to PowerScheduler.

tags.name: Current Final Grade Name
tags.desc: Current school's Current Final Grade.

tags.name: Teacher Comments
tags.desc: Inserts each teacher's comments preceded by the label Per (number).

tags.name: Even/Odd Row
tags.desc:
Toggles between oddRow & evenRow.
Use in class for tr to indicate odd and even rows

tags.name: Random Number
tags.desc: Returns a 10 digit random number.

tags.name: Random String
tags.desc: Returns a 16 character string.

tags.name: Random String
tags.desc: Returns a 32 character string.

tags.name: Random String
tags.desc: Returns a 64 character string.

tags.name: Random String
tags.desc: Returns a 128 character string.

tags.name: Random String
tags.desc: Returns a 256 character string.

tags.name: Gradebook Type
tags.desc: Returns the Gradebook type. If anyone know what the valid values are, please let me know.

tags.name: Student Screen Access
tags.desc: Checks to see if the admin user has access to the student {screen}.

tags.name: Course Name
tags.desc: Returns the Course Name of the selected FRN.

tags.name: Session Timeout in Minutes
tags.desc: Display the Session Timeout in Minutes.

tags.name: New Look Enabled
tags.desc: Display 1 if the New Look is enabled.

tags.name: Display Page Permission
tags.desc: Display 0 if no access, 1 if view only, or 2 if the user has write access to the {page_url}.
